        public boolean isArchived()
        Checks if the topic is archived. Not all topics support archiving.
        Overrides:
        isArchived in class Topic<DP,PrivateType,DP,PrivateType>
        Returns:
        true if the topic is archived, false otherwise.

      • isChannel

        public boolean isChannel()
        Checks if the topic is archived. Not all topics support archiving.
        Returns:

      • isChannel

        public static boolean isChannel(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if given topic name is a name of a channel.
        Parameters:
        name - name to check.
        Returns:
        true if the name is a name of a channel, false otherwise.

      • updateArchived

        public PromisedReply<ServerMessage> updateArchived(boolean arch)
        Archive topic by issuing Topic.setMeta(co.tinode.tinodesdk.model.MsgSetMeta<DP, DR>) with priv set to {arch: true/false}.
        Throws:
        NotSubscribedException - if the client is not subscribed to the topic
        NotConnectedException - if there is no connection to the server
